title: volume of a cylinder - write code

content.question: Which of the following cannot be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label:
double baseArea = pi * r * r; 
double volume = baseArea * h;

double volume = pi * r * r ; 
volume = volume * h;
double volume = pi * r * r * h;

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
